com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app
Interface Smarted<AggregateClass>

All Known Subinterfaces:
SmartableActivity<AggregateClass>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSmartListActivity, AbstractWrappedSmartListActivity, Droid4mizer, ForBusinessObjectActivity, SmartActivity, SmartGroupActivity, SmartListActivity, SmartMapActivity, SmartPreferenceActivity, SmartSplashScreenActivity, SmartTabActivity, WrappedSmartListActivity
public interface Smarted<AggregateClass>

Defines common methods for all activity classes defined in the framework.

Since:
2010.07.10
Author:
Édouard Mercier

Parameters:

See Also:
getAggregate()

registerBroadcastListeners

void registerBroadcastListeners(AppPublics.BroadcastListener[] broadcastListeners)
Explicitly registers wrapped broadcast receivers for the Activity.

Those receivers will be unregistered by the Activity.onDestroy() method.

When invoking that method, all previously registered listeners via the AppPublics.BroadcastListenerProvider or AppPublics.BroadcastListenersProvider are kept.

Parameters:
broadcastListeners - the wrapped receivers to registers

getMenuCommands

java.util.List<StaticMenuCommand> getMenuCommands()
Returns:
all the static menu commands that the activity wants to make available ; may return null

onException

void onException(java.lang.Throwable throwable,
                 boolean fromGuiThread)
Can be invoked when an exception is thrown, so that the ActivityController.ExceptionHandler handles it.

Parameters:
fromGuiThread - indicates whether the call is done from the GUI thread
